original_text: They came to him many times and they were saying to him, ‘Hello, King of the Jews, you are great!’ At the same time they slapped his face with their hands.
korean_text: 앞에 가서 이르되 유대인의 왕이여 평안할지어다 하며 손으로 때리더라
